summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate roster records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 10, 2019. It shows inmate counts by housing unit and includes a roster with several inmates marked with 'SUICIDE' assignment codes, indicating special monitoring status.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine inmate population count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, showing 758 total inmates with 4 out-counted.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: Document shows inmate count records from Metropolitan Correctional Center New York on August 10, 2019.
Total inmate population was 758 with 4 out-counted (not in their cells during count).
Inmate roster includes several inmates with 'SUICIDE' assignment codes, indicating they were on suicide watch or special monitoring.
The document is part of routine prison administrative records from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.
